name: The Resolution Quest [Mobile]
description:
=============================================

Here is a 2D platformer game where you control a little square.

The specificity is that when you pass a checkpoint the quality of the game increases.

Try to speed run this game to get the lowest time with the lowest amount of deaths!

This is the mobile version, if you're on pc then play the other version of the game that's freely available on my itch.io account

===============================================================
